title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of Checkboxes Should Use Busy Cursor
description: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of Checkboxes Should Use Busy Cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)
OB: When exporting a zip in a workspace with multiple projects, it takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds) for the checked state of the table to be updated. Additionally, a busy cursor is not shown during this process.
EB: The checkboxes should be updated more quickly, ideally within a few seconds. A busy cursor should be displayed to indicate that the system is processing the update.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a workspace with many projects.
2. Select the export Zip option.
3. Select all projects.
4. Choose some file types.
5. Press ok.
